summary: A comprehensive test suite for the IMOD groundwater flow library, containing unit tests that verify the correct behavior, rendering, and integration of various flow components such as anisotropy, boundaries, heads, conductivities, time discretization, drains, evapotranspiration, general head boundaries, flow barriers, model composition, output control, package groups, recharge, rivers, storage, and wells.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability and scientific accuracy of the IMOD flow modeling tools by automatically detecting regressions and validating that each flow package functions as intended across different configurations and temporal scenarios.
